Articles.Content:
Hello ! I know it's a scientific forum here but there isn't any historic thread so I begin this one...

Here, you can post your historic report on the space race between USA and URSS with the French (Example : 1965, France is the 3rd nation to have an access to space with the A1 (renamed AstÃƒÂ©rix) satellite launched with a Diamant A launcher at Hammaguir base, in Algeria), English, Japan, Chineese, etc... and the beginning of the ESA
